1.「おお……。<pc>か……。| よく…来てくれたな……。| ルナナの足取りが……: Oh. <pc>. How did you... I'm|glad you're here. I've been trying to track|Lunana's steps... I've got it.

2.「ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを…追って……| このラニアッカから 南西のザグバン丘:
Lunana is a Hexenbiest, a... "the hexenbiest|Buvros... From Laniakka here, she went|southwest through the Zagban hills to the|
|Zaag's cave at the far southern end.

3.「じつはな…… その ザアグの洞門こそ| わしが かつて レオン・ビュブロを討ち: You see... The cave of Zaag is where I once|defeated Leon Buvrot... And the place where|Horta ended up.

4.「なにやら いやな予感がする……。| レオン・ビュブロの子である 魔獣ビュブロス: I have a bad feeling about this. Why is a|hexenbiest, a son of Leon Byblos, heading|for the land of legend?

5.「<pc>よ…… 時は来た。| わしを…… かの地まで 導いてくれぬか？| そし:
... When... ...you will|help me... Will you lead me to the land of|the living? And protect Lunana from the|
|fangs of the hexenbiest.

6.「ありがたい。本当に 恩に着る……。| 目がかすみ…… いよいよ 誰かの手を借り: Yes. I really owe you. My eyes are blurry...|Now I can't do anything without someone's|help.

7.「だが あの杖さえ 取り戻せば……| わしも ビュブロスと戦える……。| それま:
But if I can just get the sceptre back... I|can fight Byblos. Until then, I'm gonna do|everything in my power to keep you alive.|
|I'll try.

8.「<pc>…… 頼んだぞ……。| ホルタとルナナ ふたりの不幸な運命の連鎖は|: <pc>... I'm counting on you.|Horta and Lunana, we must break the chain of|their unhappy fate!

9.「引き受けてくれるのは ありがたいが……。| おぬしは…… 他の者の依頼が| た: I appreciate you taking me on, but... But|you... I see you have a lot of other|people's requests.

10.「仕方あるまい……。| わしは しばらく ここにいるから| 先に そちらを片付け: It's no use. I'll be here for a while, so go|take care of that first.

11.「そうか……。だが 情けないことに| 今のわしは ひとりでは 何もできん……。|: Okay. But the shame of it is that I can't do|anything on my own now. You are my only|hope.

12.「<pc>よ…… 頼む……。| 気が変わったら また来てくれんか……。| わしは: <pc>... Please. If you change|your mind, come back. I have to protect|Renana.

13.「おお……。<pc>か……。| よく…来てくれたな……。| ルナナの足取りが……: Oh. <pc>. How did you... I'm|glad you're here. I've been trying to track|Lunana's steps... I've got it.

14.「ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを…追って……| このラニアッカから 南西のザグバン丘:
Lunana is a Hexenbiest, a... "the hexenbiest|Buvros... From Laniakka here, she went|southwest through the Zagban hills to the|
|Zaag's cave at the far southern end.

15.「じつはな…… その ザアグの洞門こそ| わしが かつて レオン・ビュブロを討ち: You see... The cave of Zaag is where I once|defeated Leon Buvrot... And the place where|Horta ended up.

16.「<pc>よ…… 時は来た。| わしを…… かの地まで 導いてくれぬか？| そし:
... When... ...you will|help me... Will you lead me to the land of|the living? And protect Lunana from the|
|fangs of the hexenbiest.

17.「わしの杖を奪った ルナナは……| 最後の…魔獣ビュブロスを追い ザグバン丘陵の:
Lunana, who took my staff... The last... I|tracked the hexenbiest Byblos to the Caves|of Zaag, in the far southern reaches of the|
|Zagban Hills.

18.「その ザアグの洞門こそ……| わしが かつて レオン・ビュブロを討ち……| ホ: The Caves of Zaag... Where I once killed|Leon Buvrot... The place of Horta's death.

19.「<pc>よ…… 時は来た。| わしを…… その因縁の地まで 導き……| そして:
... When... ...when you...|"and lead me to the land of my karma... And|protect Lunana from the fangs of the|
|hexenbiest.

20.「あの杖さえ 取り戻せば……| わしも ビュブロスと戦える……。| それまでは:
If only I could get the sceptre back. I can|fight Byblos. Until then, I'm gonna have to|do everything in my power to keep you alive.|
|I'll try.

21.「<pc>…… 頼んだぞ……。| ホルタとルナナ ふたりの不幸な運命の連鎖は|: <pc>... I'm counting on you.|Horta and Lunana, we must break the chain of|their unhappy fate!

22.「……着いたぞ。ここが わしらの因縁の地。| よもや このようなかたちで……|: ... Arrival. This is our cause. How could we|have come to be here? I never thought I'd|visit again.

24.「ルナナァ……ッ！！ 杖を……| その杖を わしに よこすのだ……ッ！！: Lunanaa... ! The sceptre... Give me the|sceptre. Give me the wand!

25.「ふふん。遅い！| 遅いわよ 賢者ブロッゲン！: . You're late! You're too late, Wise Brogen!

26.「この魔獣は あたしのエモノよ！| こいつを倒して あたしの輝かしい経歴に| 新: This hexenbiest is mine! I'm going to defeat|this thing and add another page to my|illustrious career!

27.「お…愚かな……。欲に 目がくらみおって……。| あの杖は… わしが使わなくては: Oh... Stupid. Blinded by greed. That cane...|I must use it.

28.「さあ 棒切れ！ いよいよ アンタの出番よ！| 目の前にいる魔獣を ケチョンケチ: Come on, stick! Now it's your turn! I want|you to beat the hexenbiest that's standing|right in front of you to a pulp!

29.「何度 言ったら わかるでアールか！！| ワガハイは 魔獣の光線を 防ぐのみ！！:
How many times have I told you, Earl! The|Wagahai must defend against the rays of the|Hexenbiest! And the final blow will be|
|delivered by the great Mr. Brogdon!

30.「この期に及んで なに言ってるのよ！！| そんな つまんないジョークは いいから: What the hell are you talking about? I don't|want to hear any more of your stupid jokes,|just get on with the attack.

31.「グルルル……。その愚かな物言い……。| 我が父を討った 神父ホルタの忘れ形見と: Grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr. That's a stupid thing|to say. I hardly think you're a memento of|Father Horta, who avenged my father.

32.「……ハァ！？ なんで 魔物のクチから| 父さんの名前が 出てくるワケ？: ... Huh? Why is my father's name coming out|of the demon's mouth?

33.「グルルル……。無知とは 恐ろしい……。| どうやら ここへ おびきだされたこと: Grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr. Ignorance is a terrible|thing. It's like they don't even know|they've been lured here.

34.「我ら兄弟は 父を葬った ふたりの男に| 真の復讐を果たすことのみを| 使命とし: We brothers have lived our entire lives with|the sole purpose of exacting true vengeance|on the two men who buried our father.

35.「幾多の旅人から 魂を吸い集めたのは| この地に眠る 父の怨念を呼び覚ますため！:
I have collected the souls of many a|traveler, to awaken the hatred of my father|that lies in these lands! Now is the time|
|for me to unleash my true vengeance!

36.「無念の地に眠る 父 レオン・ビュブロよ！| ついに 復讐のときは 来た！| そ:
My father, Leon Buvrot, who lies in the land|of the damned! At last, the time for revenge|has come! Trust me with your power and make|
|me a raging Hexenbiest!

38.「な…なんということだ……。| あれは…… レオン・ビュブロそのもの……。| こ: Hey... Oh, my God. That's... Leon Buvrot|himself. So that's why we're here.

39.「この姿で 父のカタキを討ち| そして その血筋をも 根絶やしにする……。| そ: In this form, I will avenge my father's|murder and exterminate his bloodline. That|is true vengeance.

40.「神父ホルタの 忘れ形見……！| まずは 貴様を 一撃で葬ってくれる！！| 震え: Father Horta's lost and found. First, he'll|bury you with a single blow! Tremble! You|little bitch!

43.「ダメだ……！ あれでは 杖が もたん……！| ヤツの…攻撃が 強すぎる……！: No! The wand won't hold. It's... It's too|strong.

45.「もう… 限界で…アーーーーーーール！！！！: I can't... I've reached my limit...|Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrr ！！！！

47.「それほどまで 死に急ぐのなら| 貴様から 血祭りにあげてくれるわァッ！！: If you're in such a hurry to die, I'll make|a bloodbath out of you!

48.「<cs_pchero> わしは もう動けん……。| 今 この危機を救えるのは: <cs_pchero> I can't move anymore. You|are the only one who can help me in this|time of crisis. Leon Buvrot... Avenge me.

49.「ルナナと…… 杖を たの…む……。: Lunana and... Cane, please... Please give me|the cane.

50.「我が復讐に アダなす者よ……。| また 現れたか……。: He who is addicted to my vengeance. There|you are again.

51.「邪魔立ては 許さぬ！| 今度こそ 血祭りにあげてくれるわァッ！！: I will not allow you to interfere! This|time, they'll make a bloodbath of us!

54.「……ふん。| コイツ…… 父親のチカラなんかに頼るから| こんな あわれな最期: ... This guy... He met such a pitiful end|because he relied on his father's power.

55.「ルナナ……。無事で なによりだ……。| さあ その杖を わしに返せ……。| お: Lunana. Thank God you're all right. Now|return the staff to me. You won't be needing|it anymore, will you?

56.「ハァ！？ 冗談じゃないわよ！: Huh! You've got to be kidding me!

57.「こんな使える杖 簡単に 手放すものですか！| これがあれば どんな攻撃にも耐え:
I wouldn't give up such a useful cane so|easily! You know how many attacks I can|withstand with this thing? You can be as|
|famous as you want to be, if you know how to|use it!

58.「それよりも……。ねえ！| なんで あの魔物 父さんのこと 知ってたの？| あな: It's more than that. Hey! How did that|monster know about my father? You... Are you|hiding something?

60.「……杖があれば どんな攻撃にも耐えられる？| やれやれ……。父親に頼っているの: ... With the cane, can you withstand any|attack? Oh, dear. I'm sure you're just as|dependent on your father as I am.

61.「ハァ！？ この棒 なに言ってんの！？| ワケわかんないこと 言ってんじゃないわ: Huh? What are you talking about? Don't talk|nonsense to me!

62.「……あたしは 名声なんか いらない！| そう言って 名の知れた父親を 嫌ってい: ... I don't need fame! So the boy who used|to hate his famous father is now a fame|freak?

63.「なんで……？ なんで そのことを……！？: Why did you...? Why did you tell me that?

65.「……はい ブロッゲンさま。| もはや 復讐の因果は 解かれましたし| ちょうど: ... Yes, Bloge. Now that the karma of|revenge has been undone, I thought it would|be a good time.

66.「ちょ… ちょっと 待ちなさいよ！| 今 ホルタって 言った！？| その杖が 父: Hey... Hey, wait a minute! Did you just say|"Horta"? You're telling me that cane is my|father?

67.「……ルナナ よく聞きなさい。| 私は はやり病で 果てたのではありません。|: ... Lunana I've heard a lot about. I was not|killed by an epidemic. I was killed by Leon|Buvrot.

68.「かつて 私と ブロッゲンさまは| レオン・ビュブロと戦い 勝利しました。| だ: Once, I and the Lady Bruggen fought Leon|Buvrot and won. But the cost was too great.

69.「……私は 致命的なキズを負い| ブロッゲンさまも また 全精力を使い果たし|: ... I was mortally wounded, and Mr. Brogen,|too, was drained of all energy and unable to|move an inch.

70.「放っておけば 死に至るのは 明白……。| たとえ 命を取り留めたとしても| 誰: It's obvious that if left unchecked, it will|lead to death. Even if he survives, he can't|live without the support of others.

71.「ブロッゲンさまの 心と身体は| それほどまでに 弱り果てていたのです。: Brogen's mind and body were in such a state|of weakness.

72.「そこで 私は いよいよ事切れる直前……| ブロッゲンさまに こう申し上げました: So, right before I was about to expire... I|said to Mr. Bruggen...

73.「これからは 私が 目となり クチとなり| あなたを 支えていきましょう。どうか: From now on, I will be your eyes, your beak,|your support. Please carry my dying soul in|your wand.

74.「……こうして 私の命は 尽きましたが| 私は ブロッゲンさまの杖として| 生ま: ... And so my life was ended, but I was|reborn as Lord Bruggen's staff.

75.「なかば眠っている ブロッゲンさまに代わり| 杖である私が 世話を焼いているのは: That's why I, as your wand, am taking care|of you in place of the half-asleep Lord|Brogen, and that's why.

76.「そして ルナナ……。| 私は 杖となってからも| あなたのことを 見ていました: And Lunana. I've been watching you since you|became a cane.

77.「ウソでしょ……。| ホントに この杖が 父さんだったなんて……。: Oh, my God. I can't believe this cane is|really my dad.

78.「……昔の あなたは 功名心の鬼ではなかった。| しかし 今は 周りの人を巻き込: ... In the past, you were not a man of|merit. But now you're trying to gain fame|without getting others involved.

79.「あなたが そんな風に変わってしまったのは| 死んでしまった 私のため……。: You changed like that because of me, because|I'm dead.

80.「……そう。私以上の 名声を得ることで| 私が生きているときに できなかった親孝:
... It seems to me that by achieving greater|fame than I did, he is trying to fulfill the|filial duty he was unable to do when I was|
|alive.

81.「本当に そうだとしたら| 私は 素直に うれしいです。| ありがとう ルナナ…: If that's really the case, I'm honestly|happy. Thank you, Lunana.

82.「ふん……。父さんが そう思うなら| 勝手に そう思ってれば？: Hmm. If that's what you think, why don't you|just go ahead and think it?

84.「本当に 名声を得たいのであれば| 私利私欲を 忘れなさい。| そして 周囲から: If you really want to make a name for|yourself, forget about personal gain. And be|someone that people trust.

85.「ちょ…… ちょっと待ったッ！！| いい話になるかと思ったら お説教！？| 杖に:
Hey... Wait a minute! I thought this was|going to be a good story, but now you're|lecturing me? I don't want to be lectured by|
|a cane!

86.「あたしは あたしのやり方で 生きていくの！| だいたいね！ あたしは昔っから|: I'm going to live my life my way! Most of|the time! I always hated my preachy father!

87.「あー ヤダヤダ！ 自分の父親が 棒だなんて| 恥ずかしくって 誰にも言えないわ: Oh, no, no, no! I'm too embarrassed to tell|anyone that my father is a stick! I feel|really bad!

88.「ムチェッ ブチャッ！ 行くわよ！| こんなとこ さっさと引き上げましょう！: Muchacho! Buchacho! Let's go! Let's get the|hell out of here!

89.「ルナナッ！ 待ちなさい！| まだ 話が……: Lunanak! Wait! I need to talk to you.

91.「……話なんて いつでも できるじゃない。| 父さんは そこにいるって| わかっ: ... We can always talk. I know you're there.

92.「それよりも…… いいッ？| その杖から しっかり見ときなさいよ！| あたしの: It's more like... Okay? You better watch|that cane! I'm going to be a part of the|legend!

93.「やれやれ……。| 根は 悪い子ではないんですがねえ。| どこで 教育を 間違え: Oh, dear. He's not a bad kid at heart. I|don't know where I went wrong in my|education.

94.「<cs_pchero>さん。旅人の あなたなら| また あの子に 会うかもしれ: As a traveler, you might see her again. If|you do, please give her my best.

95.「それではッ！ ワガハイは| いつもの しゃべり方に 戻るでアール！！| これ: All right, then! Wagahai, go back to your|usual way of speaking! I like this one a|lot.

96.「<cs_pchero>……。| おぬしの おかげで ホルタ親子は救われた。|: Thanks to you, Horta and her son will be|saved. I really appreciate it.

97.「これは 今までの礼だ。| 受け取ってくれ。: This is the first time I've ever...|Received.

98.「<cs_pchero>よ。わしは いつか| 子供たちに 怒鳴ったことがあったな: I yelled at my children once. This staff is|made of my sins.

99.「そう……。この杖は わしの罪だ。| 戦友のホルタに 安らかな眠りを与えず| 杖: Yes. I am the wand. I who denied our friend|Horta a good night's sleep and locked him in|my wand.

100.「犯した罪は 消えるものではない。| ……だが ホルタとルナナが 心を通わし|: The sins you commit can be erased. But...|But when Horta and Lunana communicated with|each other, my heart felt a little better.

101.「今ならば あの子供たちに| 笑って 杖を 見せられるかもしれんな。: Maybe now I can show the cane to those kids|with a smile on my face.

102.「それでは <cs_pchero>。| わしは この杖…ホルタと ふたたび旅に出: I'll take this stick... Horta and I will|travel again. Somewhere else.

103.「<cs_pchero>！ さようならでアーール！| 本当に ありがとうなのでア: <cs_pchero>! Really, thank you so much|so Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!!!!
